question: The P-V diagram of a Carnot's engine is shown in the graph below. The engine uses 1 mole of an ideal gas as working substance. From the graph, the area enclosed by the $P-V$ diagram is [The heat supplied to the gas is 8000 J]
images/a5b6c7d8-e9f0-4a1b-2c3d-4e5f6a7b8c9d.png
explanation: The area enclosed by the P-V diagram represents the work done per cycle.
